Public transport is available all year - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 An ambulance service or transport that can be made available to hire to take me to hospital is available in the area and I know how to reach them - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I can reach a shop selling food items within walking distance - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I can reach the AWC without help - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 Electricity is available in my house - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I live in an earthquake resistant house. - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I live in a weather proof house with a CGI roof - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 A toilet exists in my house - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 A functioning water tap is in or close to the house - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I have an adequate bed and mattress - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I have what would appear to be safe wiring in my home - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I am using open fire in the house (to cook or for heating) - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0
I have ownership over my finances - IF YES SCORE 2, IF NO SCORE 0 I have enough money to buy food and other things I need without borrowing money from others - IF YES SCORE 2, IF NO SCORE 0 I spend my pension on supporting my family in their daily life - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I have borrowed money - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I can identify currency notes of different denominations and count them. - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I am paid my WP into the bank - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0
I see family, friends and people from the community daily - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I have a working mobile phone and/or a landline which is charged most of the time - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I have access to a phone from others nearby and can use it - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I can call and receive calls on my phone - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 My care giver delivers the support I need and on the times I need it - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 The care giver feels he/she can easily give the right support - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 The care giver can still take care of his/her own daily tasks and/or has help with thes - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 If feel safe and secure with my care giver - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0
I am mentally healthy - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I feel regular feelings of loneliness, sadness, confusion, anxiety, insercurity - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0
I feel I have an important role in my family - IF YES SCORE 2, IF NO SCORE 0 If feel I have an important role in my community - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I feel my life is meaningful - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I can do the rituals I want to do when I want to do them - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0
I can get from my bed to a chair without help - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I can go to the toilet without help - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I dress myself daily without help - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I do laundry myself - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I prepare a meal for myself - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I can use public transport when needed - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I can read and write - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0
A health post / hospital is within walking distance - score 3, not managed - score 0 I am healthy - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I know which medical conditions I have and what I have to do to control them - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I think I need to see a medical person on a regular basis - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I take my medication as prescribed by my physician and without any help - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I can see well enough to perform daily tasks - IF YES SCORE 3, IF NO SCORE 0 I can hear well enough to understand conversations - IF YES SCORE 3, IF NO SCORE 0 My memory is good. - IF YES SCORE 3, IF NO SCORE 0 I tripped or fell in the last three months - IF YES SCORE 3, IF NO SCORE 0 Without wanting to I have lost or gained 5 kilos in the past six months - IF YES SCORE 3, IF NO SCORE 0 I have tooth or mouth problems - IF YES SCORE 3, IF NO SCORE 0 I eat at least two healthy meals a day, and take fruits, vegetables and dairy products daily - IF YES SCORE 3, IF NO SCORE 0 I take three or more alcoholic drinks like rakshi, beer, every day - IF YES SCORE 3, IF NO SCORE 0 I wash myself and brush my teeth daily without help - IF YES SCORE 3, IF NO SCORE 0
I do daily moderate work, like sweeping, tidying, dusting, making the bed, in the house - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I do daily work outside - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0 I have hobbies I do on a daily or weekly basis - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0
